item.title: Reference Links: the wiki way(?)
item.description: This is about creating a shorthand so i don’t have to type out the full web address of a certain resource, every time i want to point to it. Testing Reference Links So here’s a list of those: Walt’s ReFarm Blog Walt’s GitHub Pages site The Farm’s website And that’s how it looks. Invisible Links:
